name: Recipe: Tomates Narbonnaises
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Tomates Narbonnaises.

value.text: Purchase from Sanguinetti at Hotel Debord in Court of Fontaine

customize.name: Onion
customize.desc: A spherical vegetable. As vengeance for cutting it, it will make you cry, no matter how brave you are.

customize.name: Tomato
customize.desc: A bright red ingredient that gives a tangy kick. Yes, the "fruit or vegetable" debate is still going...

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Bacon
customize.desc: Smoked strips of pork. Crispy with a bit of fat, but not too greasy. Mmmmm... bacon.

customize.name: Tomates Narbonnaises
customize.desc: A dish with a well-balanced proportion of meat and vegetables. Hollow out a round tomato, fill the hollowed tomato with ground meat, then bake this combination. This dish has a sour flavor and a tender texture. It is a very popular choice on Fontainian tables.
